column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If you're in Chicago
column2: deep dish pizza is a must. & Lou's pizza is the absolute best. A friend & I were looking for Gazzola's pizza in the area yesterday
column3: HIMYM fans will know about this place. What we didn't know is that it doesn't exist. We found the closest pizza place from our location & couldn't have been happier with what we found.
